meanings.definition: Resembling a viper in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The toy snake had a viperlike pattern on its skin.
meanings.sent2: The sneaky character moved in a viperlike manner, ready to strike.
meanings.sent3: The viperlike cat stealthily crept up on its toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp gaze was viperlike, piercing through any facade.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds gathered in a viperlike formation, foretelling a storm.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a viper.
meanings.sent1: The plant's leaves had a viperlike texture, rough and scaly.
meanings.sent2: His words were as venomous and viperlike as a snake's bite.
meanings.sent3: The viperlike car slithered smoothly through the winding roads.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was viperlike, hiding a dangerous intent beneath.
meanings.sent5: The viperlike hiss of the wind sent shivers down her spine.
